bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & seatstay w/alloy chainstay, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, internal front derailleur cable routing, Stealth dropper post routing, ISCG 05 mount, magnesium EVO Link, Mino Link, 150mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Rhythm Elite Tubeless Ready 28-hole disc wheel system, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub
Bontrager XR3 Team Issue Tubeless Ready, 26x2.35"
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
